title: Team Dynamics Management: Collaborative Learning Design Under Environmental Pressures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Elementary School Educational Practices and Team Collaboration Experience
context.additional_context: Educational settings frequently require teachers with diverse authority and experience to collaborate. This course explores methods to recognize power disparities within hierarchical team structures and facilitate effective team learning under environmental pressures (e.g., limited resources, urgent educational goals)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze power asymmetry scenarios in simulated environments and assess team interaction patterns.
Learners can propose at least three concrete strategies to enhance team egalitarianism under environmental constraints.
Learners can design practical solutions to improve learning barriers arising from hierarchical team structures through VR-based collaborative tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
